seo.title: Transition Coaching – 6 sessions for relocation & role change | SustainSage
seo.description: A structured yet gentle coaching space to clarify your move to the UK, stabilise change, and shape work that fits real life.

hero.title: Transition Coaching – 6 sessions
hero.subtitle: A structured yet gentle space to think clearly, stabilise your move, and shape work that fits your real life in the UK.

fit.title: Is this for you?
items: You’ve recently moved (or are about to move) to the UK and feel pulled between practical tasks, cultural differences, and expectations from home.
You’re stepping into a new role or sector and want to design how you show up, rather than “winging it” until burnout.
You’re tired of advice that doesn’t get your context. You want a calm partner to think with, not someone to tell you who to be.
You’d like a clear frame: what to focus on in the next 3–6 months, without pretending everything can be fixed at once.

journey.title: What we do together (6 sessions)
journey.description: Each session builds on what you notice and need. You lead the agenda; we support with reflection, questions, and structure.

sessions.title: Mapping your reality
sessions.description: Clarify what has changed, what’s at stake, and what “good enough for now” looks like.

sessions.title: Values & non-negotiables
sessions.description: Identify what must stay true for you (health, care work, finances, identity).

sessions.title: Options & small experiments
sessions.description: Turn vague ideas (“better job”, “better balance”) into 2–3 testable moves.

sessions.title: Boundaries & conversations
sessions.description: Prepare key conversations (manager, partner, family, self) in a grounded way.

sessions.title: Adjust & deepen
sessions.description: Review experiments, refine your focus, and widen options if needed.

sessions.title: Integrate & future-proof
sessions.description: Capture what you’ve learned, decide what support you still want, and how you’ll notice if you’re drifting.

ethics.title: How we work (ICF aligned)
items: You lead the agenda. We bring questions, reflection and structure.
We do not diagnose, fix you, or promise outcomes.
If therapy, legal or immigration advice is more appropriate, we will name it and signpost where we can.

example.title: A real-world example
example.body: “A mid-30s professional moved to the UK with their partner. No local network, unsure whether to restart in the same industry. Over 6 sessions we mapped constraints, clarified financial & family needs, tested two role directions, and set boundaries with an employer who kept “stretching” expectations. They left with a concrete 3–6 month plan and language to explain their choices at home and at work.”
example.note: Every coaching journey is different. The example above is anonymised and shared with permission to illustrate how we work.

body.value: Use the intro call to sense whether this frame feels useful. If not, we won’t convince you otherwise.
